entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve OutputCaching vary-by API #43355
  • Remove blocking APIs in asp.net core integration tests code #43353
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, json #43350
  • SignalR client-to-server streaming method on Hub not recognized as streaming unless return type contains stream parameter #43347
  • Why does ForwardedHeadersMiddleware remove headers from the request?! #43344
  • Visual Studio/ Blazor - resx files improperly nested under razor.cs #43342
  • System.NullReferenceException: at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_HasFormContentType #43339
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #43338
  • Create Angular/React 7.0/6.0 project and use the command line to run project, the browser page always displays "Launching the spa proxy...“. #43335

Closed

  • Host grpc service in iis or as an app service? #9020
    Discussions
  • Blazor :Code doesn't compile following official documentation #42710
    Backlog
  • Testserver doesn't validate dependency injection as a normal host server #43217
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext #43314
  • Support authenticate attribute to specify authN schemes for controllers or method #42163
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43354
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Fix endpoints in StaticFileAuth sample #43352
    area-security, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43336
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove enable HTTP/3 client option #43282
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • Add QUIC event source logging to flakey test #43281
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Increase Kestrel's default HTTP/2 upload window sizes #43324
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 7.0-rc1
  • Exclusively use Azure (public) feeds #43303
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • Move badges to under header to match runtime's README #43348
    community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc2 #43240
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0-rc2

Updated

  • Support LF request line terminator in HttpParser #43202
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #43329
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Cancel client results after a default timeout (and fix cancel closing connection) #43249
    area-signalr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add support for running final conventions during build #43225
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix resolving method declaration in separate file #43323
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Store and reuse client certificate task #43270
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Only create context if an event is set #43211
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
